data.message: Nobody wants to hear thier grandfather rap. Put the mic down and pass the torche to odian aka gods son...the prince of peace..the beast

replies.message: If that gods son was any good at least someone would hear of him.
Oh don't worry the world will know soon enough

Just like Rock Stars their fans never go away. Well it is the same for Rappers their Fans age with them and never go away. So you tell god's son to get fans in his lane and stop telling Rappers our age to retire because we started this shit and we (the rappers & their aged fans) aren't going anywhere because many rappers these days can barley stand on the same podium as season rappers. In other words aged fans won't buy new rap.
